title: 410Atlanta Federal Reserve President Who Violated Trading Rules to Step Down, Opening Vacancy(www.th
content:
414 Atlanta Federal Reserve President Who Violated Trading Rules to Step Down, Opening Vacancy (www.thegatewaypundit.com) posted 2 hours ago by Trick 24 comments award share report block JUST IN: Atlanta Federal Reserve President Who Violated Trading Rules to Step Down, Opening Vacancy | The Gateway Pundit | by Cr... Raphael Bostic, president and CEO of the Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta announced on Wednesday that he will retire at the end of his term in February, opening up a vacancy. www.thegatewaypundit.com
24 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save PhilipeNegro 18 points 1 hour ago That guy? Atlanta? You’re kidding. permalink award report block reply MissingTrump 9 points 41 minutes ago No arrests, and he gets to keep his pension. Frigging insanity. permalink parent award report block reply mikethemarine 2 points 36 minutes ago yep, I came here to say just that, if it was me or you we would be going to jail for insider trading or what ever he did, He was planning to retire and he took ONE big hit at the end and still gets out with EVERYTHING and keeps drawing a pension on top of it. This was retirement planning at the highest permalink parent award report block reply auntjemima 10 points 1 hour ago Meanwhile Lisa Cook just keeps on going while the Supreme Court sits on the case until next year. permalink award report block reply drattastic1 5 points 50 minutes ago They need diversity and shiiiiiiiiiiiiiit. permalink parent award report block reply Iremembermypassword 9 points 1 hour ago Imagine if he got arrested! permalink award report block reply BLMTrying2GetUrGuns 2 points 26 minutes ago Son, this is reality....stop dreaming. permalink parent award report block reply Bldg_2019 6 points 1 hour ago Can never keep their hands out of the cookie jar. 🍌 permalink award report block reply BoomShtick 3 points 1 hour ago Jigs gonna jig permalink parent award report block reply UrShulgi 4 points 32 minutes ago I don't know who needs to hear this, but this is HUGE for the following reason:  J-Pow, current head of the fed reserve, hates Trump, has said he wants it to be his legacy that he resisted Trump.  Trump wants someone in the fed who will play ball, and that ain't J-Pow.  J-Pow is expected to NOT STEP DOWN from the board when his term as leader ends, which breaks from historical standards.  If J-Pow doesn't step down, the board is still full, and Trump can't appoint 'his guy' onto the fed to become chair.  That's why they're fighting Lisa Cook getting removed so hard...the fed chair has to be elected from the existing board.  By this guy retiring, Trump sidesteps the fuckery of J-Pow not retiring and Lisa Cook fighting in court, and has the vacancy to appoint, and can get who he wants as fed chair...which is YUUUUUGE. permalink award report block reply BidenSniffsLittleKid 4 points 1 hour ago Cheaper rates for my 50 year mortgage!!!
